# tf.op_scope

``` python
tf.op_scope(
    values,
    name,
    default_name=None
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py).

See the guide: [Building Graphs > Defining new operations](../../../api_guides/python/framework#Defining_new_operations)

DEPRECATED. Same as name_scope above, just different argument order.
